name: Baby Smash
description:
This game, that was made for the ToBuJam, is about killing baby's. Baby's have started a revolution, and it's your job to smash them back into their place!

Controls:

Click to drop brick, hold to fire gun, e to unequip weapon

Note: By baby, I don't mean infant, or small child. I mean really bad people. DO NOT GET THEM CONFUSED!
